PSS

Professional Scaffolding Service

We are a scaffold rental service, dedicated to providing quality, efficient and cost-effective services for our clients.

Learn More

About Us

Established in 2018, Professional Scaffolding Service brings together members who have been in the scaffolding industry for decades. We take pride in their experience and work ethic, which enable us to provide high-quality work to our clients. With the cuplock scaffold system, we are able to quickly and efficiently erect and dismantle scaffolds for the Industrial and Commercial markets throughout California.

Services

We provide our services to a wide range of clients in the oil fields, power plants, cement plants, chemical plants and food processing plants industries. Currently the locations to which we provide services are the counties of Kern, Ventura, San Ardo, Coalinga and are constantly looking to expand to wherever work is needed. There is no job too large or small for us to undertake, as there is always a willingness to work.

Safety

The health and well-being of our clients and employees is one of our perennial concerns at Professional Scaffold Service, therefore our employees are required to attend training seminars and certification courses to ensure they are knowledgeable and aware of all the appropriate safety measures. These annual or biennial trainings along with our commitment to providing a safe workplace environment help facilitate our commitment to safety
